title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY; stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: K./9/30/33; inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCALE 1"-1'0"; lower right corner: 7509 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil, lower right: P; upper margin right in red color pencil: DIN-A4; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation for end table/sideboard. Top of table in dark, reflective material (Bakelite ?); body in lighter wood, legs in darker wood. One narrow drawer below surface with long horizontal pull. Rounded lower edges on side of table; four straight, squared, and tapered legs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-929.
